data.md:MetaData: Meteorological observations during ALKEMADE cruise from Batavia to Texel started at 1774-11-09

Ship: Alkemade, Voyage: Batavia - Texel, 1st Observer: Pieter Grijp (Derde Waak), Company: VOC, Dutch Asiatic Shipping Number: 7926.2, Other ship information: LENGTE SCHIP: 150 VOETEN, LAADVERMOGEN 1150 TON, GEBOUWD IN 1768 TE AMSTERDAM
CLIWOC: A Climatological Database for the World's Oceans 1750–1854 (and 10 more publications about CLIWOC results in the same volume)
